BALL BROTHERS RESEARCH CORPORATION
TELEPHONE AREA (303) 442-2965
BOULDER INDUSTRIAL PARK â€¢ BOULDER, COLORADO 80301
TELETYPE (303) 443-6290
May 19, 1965
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Dupont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C.
Gentlemen:
Ball Brothers Research Corporation is actively engaged in the
manufacture of television equipment and we would be interested in
learning about the requirements necessary to belong to the NAEB
as a member or as an associate, whichever might be the case.
Could you please send the necessary information and forms that
we might proceed in becoming affiliated.
Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Sincerely yours,
Video Products Application Engineer
RJJrjr
